BtcVaultStrategy.description: Main strategy contract for multi-collateral BTC vault

BtcVaultToken.name: Sova Prime BTC
BtcVaultToken.description: ERC4626 vault token representing shares in the BTC strategy

PriceOracleReporter.description: Price oracle for reporting NAV (Net Asset Value) per share

CollateralViewLib.description: Library for collateral view functions (internal use)

keyFeatures.multiCollateral: Supports multiple BTC-pegged tokens (sovaBTC, WBTC, cbBTC)
keyFeatures.navAwareDeposits: Deposits are priced according to current NAV
keyFeatures.erc4626Compatible: Implements ERC4626 vault standard with extensions

depositCollateral.function: depositCollateral(address token, uint256 amount, address receiver)
depositCollateral.description: Deposit BTC collateral (WBTC, cbBTC, or sovaBTC) to receive spBTC shares
depositCollateral.note: Must approve token spending first. Minimum deposit: 1000 satoshis (0.00001000 BTC)

previewDeposit.description: Preview how many shares you'll receive for a deposit

checkValue.description: Convert shares to underlying asset value

getTotalCollateral.description: Get total value of all collateral held

getSupportedTokens.description: Get list of all supported collateral tokens

getCurrentPrice.description: Get current NAV per share (returns 18 decimal value)

redemptions.note: Redemptions require off-chain signature from strategy manager
process: 1. User requests withdrawal through off-chain API
2. Manager reviews and signs withdrawal request
3. User submits signed request to redeem() function
4. Contract validates signature and processes redemption

events.CollateralAdded: Emitted when new collateral type is added (strategy)
